message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you! I think it's a great opportunity for you to acquire this valuable item. I'm willing to offer it to you for $6,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering the value of the product to me, I would like to propose an offer of $5,500.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm not willing to sell the product for $5,500. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $6,500. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the product's value to you.
I understand your position, Alice. Let's try to find a middle ground. I would like to propose an offer of $6,200 for the product.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I'm still not willing to sell the product for $6,200. I'm willing to compromise further and offer it to you for $6,800. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value to you.
I appreciate your efforts to reach an agreement, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $6,600 for the product.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I'm still not willing to sell the product for $6,600. I'm willing to make one more compromise and offer it to you for $7,000. I think this is the best price we can agree on, considering the product's value to you.
I understand your position, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $6,900 for the product.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I'm still not willing to sell the product for $6,900. I'm willing to make one last compromise and offer it to you for $7,200. I think this is the best price we can agree on, considering the product's value to you.
After careful consideration, I would like to counter with an offer of $7,100 for the product.
